org.apache.flume.source.taildir

Class TaildirSourceConfigurationConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flume.source.taildir.TaildirSourceConfigurationConstants

  • public class TaildirSourceConfigurationConstants
extends Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BATCH_SIZE
      What size to batch with before sending to ChannelProcessor.
      static String BYTE_OFFSET_HEADER
      Whether to add the byte offset of a tailed line to the header
      static String BYTE_OFFSET_HEADER_KEY 
      static String CACHE_PATTERN_MATCHING
      Whether to cache the list of files matching the specified file patterns till parent directory is modified.
      static int DEFAULT_BATCH_SIZE 
      static boolean DEFAULT_BYTE_OFFSET_HEADER 
      static boolean DEFAULT_CACHE_PATTERN_MATCHING 
      static boolean DEFAULT_FILE_HEADER 
      static String DEFAULT_FILENAME_HEADER_KEY 
      static int DEFAULT_IDLE_TIMEOUT 
      static String DEFAULT_POSITION_FILE 
      static boolean DEFAULT_SKIP_TO_END 
      static int DEFAULT_WRITE_POS_INTERVAL 
      static String FILE_GROUPS
      Mapping for tailing file groups.
      static String FILE_GROUPS_PREFIX 
      static String FILENAME_HEADER
      Whether to include absolute path filename in a header.
      static String FILENAME_HEADER_KEY
      Header in which to put absolute path filename.
      static String HEADERS_PREFIX
      Mapping for putting headers to events grouped by file groups.
      static String IDLE_TIMEOUT
      Time (ms) to close idle files.
      static String POSITION_FILE
      Path of position file.
      static String SKIP_TO_END
      Whether to skip the position to EOF in the case of files not written on the position file.
      static String WRITE_POS_INTERVAL
      Interval time (ms) to write the last position of each file on the position file.
